decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Tireless Tribe as a combo piece to activate its ability by discarding cards and pumping it up to deal massive damage to the opponent in a single turn. It includes various cheap cantrips and countermagic spells to find and protect the combo pieces, as well as ways to tutor key cards like Circular Logic and Inside Out. Wedding Invitation can also be used to gain life to stay in the game longer. The deck aims to quickly set up the combo and win the game before the opponent can stop it.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures to bring back using reanimation spells like Dread Return and Exhume. The key strategy is to combo off by getting a large creature like Lotleth Giant or Oliphaunt onto the battlefield early and overwhelming the opponent with powerful attacks. Cards like Gnaw to the Bone and Acorn Harvest help to sustain the player's life total while they set up their graveyard. Using a mix of aggressive creatures and reanimation spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and powerful reanimated army.
